articles.title: St. Paul Animal Control sees opportunity for collaboration
articles.description: ST. PAUL, Minn. (AP) — Molly Lunaris faced a cat crisis: 84 felines, most of them less than a year old, roaming largely unattended in a St. Paul home.

articles.title: Defending champ Sandgren wins 1st round match in Auckland
articles.description: AUCKLAND, New Zealand (AP) — Defending champion Tennys Sandgren of the United States is into the second round of the ASB Classic, beating New Zealand doubles specialist Michael Venus 6-4, 6-3.
